citations.narrative:
The licensee does not have any form of identification on the adult dogs in the facility. Proper identification is essential to
ensure that each dog can be properly identified and to facilitate proper record keeping.
The licensee must obtain and provide each animal with an official form of identification at all times and to facilitate record
keeping requirements.
To be corrected by: 17 June 23

There is an open bag of bedding inside of the facility. Supplies of food and bedding must be stored in a manner that
protects the supplies from spoilage, contamination, and vermin infestation. The licensee must put all open bags of
bedding inside of a container with a tightly fitting lid. All open bags of food or bedding must be kept in a container with a
tightly fitting lid at all times to prevent spoilage, contamination and vermin infestation at all times.
To be corrected by: 20 May 23
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.
n

narrative:
2.50(a)(1) 
   
Time and method of identification. 
The licensee does not have any form of identification on the adult dogs in the facility.  Proper identification is essential to 
ensure that each dog can be properly identified and to facilitate proper record keeping.   
The licensee must obtain and provide each animal with an official form of identification at all times and to facilitate record 
keeping requirements.  
To be corrected by: 17 June 23 
3.1(e) 
   
Housing facilities, general. 
There is an open bag of bedding inside of the facility.  Supplies of food and bedding must be stored in a manner that 
protects the supplies from spoilage, contamination, and vermin infestation. The licensee must put  all open bags of 
bedding inside of a container with a tightly fitting lid. All open bags of food or bedding must be kept in a container with a 
tightly fitting lid at all times to prevent spoilage, contamination and vermin infestation at all times.  
To be corrected by: 20 May 23 
 
This inspection and exit interview were conducted with facility representative.

n
